languages.text: {n}Взгляд Маражая моментально тухнет, и он отстраняется, глядя куда-то вбок.{/n}
{n}The fire in Marazhai's gaze is instantly doused, and he steps away, his eyes looking off to one side.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Маражая моментально тухнет, и он отстраняется, глядя куда-то вбок.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El fuego en los ojos de Marazhai se extingue al momento y se aleja, mirando a otra parte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fire in Marazhai's gaze is instantly doused, and he steps away, his eyes looking off to one side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El fuego en los ojos de Marazhai se extingue al momento y se aleja, mirando a otra parte.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋目光中的火焰瞬间被浇灭，他移开了视线，走开了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fire in Marazhai's gaze is instantly doused, and he steps away, his eyes looking off to one side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋目光中的火焰瞬间被浇灭，他移开了视线，走开了。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの視線から炎が消え、彼は目を横に逸らしつつ立ち去った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fire in Marazhai's gaze is instantly doused, and he steps away, his eyes looking off to one side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの視線から炎が消え、彼は目を横に逸らしつつ立ち去った。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}La flamme qui dansait dans le regard de Marazhai s'éteint aussitôt, et il détourne les yeux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fire in Marazhai's gaze is instantly doused, and he steps away, his eyes looking off to one side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La flamme qui dansait dans le regard de Marazhai s'éteint aussitôt, et il détourne les yeux.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Das Feuer in Marazhais Blick erlischt sofort und er tritt beiseite, ohne dich anzusehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fire in Marazhai's gaze is instantly doused, and he steps away, his eyes looking off to one side.{/n}

languages.original_text: {n}The fire in Marazhai's gaze is instantly doused, and he steps away, his eyes looking off to one side.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın gözlerindeki alev, anında sönüyor. Gözlerini yana kaydırıp geriye bir adım atıyor.{/n}
